sentences.en: This diving lobsterman was struck by a needlefish on his anterior neck and presented with extensive subcutaneous crepitus and hemoptysis on arrival at the emergency room.
sentences.cn: 这是一个潜水捕捉龙虾的渔夫被针鱼撞击到前颈部，送达急诊室时，有广大面积皮下气肿及吐出痰中带血等症状。

sentences.en: We report on an unusual case of penetrating tracheal injury caused by a needlefish.
sentences.cn: 我们报告一个被针鱼刺伤穿通气管的罕见个案。

trans.tran_cn: 颌针鱼（一种长嘴便鳞的海鱼）
trans.tran_en: any ferocious teleost fish of the family Belonidae of warm and tropical regions, having an elongated body and long toothed jaws
